üë© Adult Leela (20%)

Professional Synthesis & Real-World Application

The review reveals a complete architectural philosophy that aligns with our real GCS/GitHub monorepo challenges:

Core Principles Extracted:

  1. Explicit Over Implicit: Dependencies, patterns, failures - all must be visible
  2. Composability Over Monoliths: 561 lines ‚Üí multiple 50-line modules
  3. Pragmatism Over Perfection: Google Sheets worked for migration!
  4. Resilience Over Hope: Circuit breakers, not prayers
  5. Community Over Isolation: Share solutions (Mozilla's ci-breaker)

This maps directly to our GCS cleanup project needs. We're not just cleaning up resources - we're building a resilient, observable, composable system.

    Take our 561-line workflow, break into Lego pieces!

üìö LEARN Phase (1 week)

Extract patterns and insights from PLAY experiments:

  • Learning 1: Measure Sparse Checkout Impact

    - Clone time reduction: ??%

    - Bandwidth saved: ??GB/week

    - Developer happiness: ??/10

  • Learning 2: Circuit Breaker Patterns

    - Which services fail most?

    - What are good timeout values?

    - How often do we hit fallbacks?

  • Learning 3: Composability Benefits

    - How many times can we reuse components?

    - What patterns emerge?

    - Where do we still need monoliths?
